meanings.definition: Engaged in physical activity to improve health or fitness.
meanings.sent1: She exercised by going for a walk every morning.
meanings.sent2: He exercised at the gym to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The dog exercised by running around the park.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's movements on stage were like a beautifully exercised routine.
meanings.sent5: The children exercised vigorously during their PE class.

meanings.sent1: She exercised caution when crossing the busy street.
meanings.sent2: He exercised his right to remain silent during the interrogation.
meanings.sent3: The chef exercised care while handling the sharp knives.
meanings.sent4: The CEO exercised his authority to make important decisions.
meanings.sent5: The teacher exercised patience while explaining the difficult concept.

meanings.definition: Demonstrated or displayed a particular skill or quality.
meanings.sent1: She exercised her creativity by painting a beautiful mural.
meanings.sent2: He exercised his leadership skills during the team project.
meanings.sent3: The musician exercised his talent by playing a mesmerizing melody.
meanings.sent4: The actor exercised his versatility by taking on diverse roles.
meanings.sent5: The athlete exercised his speed during the sprint race.
